TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content:
My brand new heavy jet design gently tapped the R&D building...![DBCDBAF5AAE2153AF270A693FA5CD8A43BC4A587](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/421441399975349770/DBCDBAF5AAE2153AF270A693FA5CD8A43BC4A587/)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-08T22:01:20Z" title="02/08/2016 10:01  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 8, 2016</time> by Choctofliatrio2.0**

![6fAJwe0.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/6fAJwe0.jpg)

Jeb and Bill after crashing a rover on Duna. It must've tumbled around for half a minute or more, coming to rest like this with most parts strewn across the hillside it tumbled down of. Whenever I see this photo I can hear Jeb go 'wheee' in my mind (and perhaps [a hubcap bouncing by](http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/FreeWheel)).

> 
> 
> On June 3, 2015 at 6:22 PM, Stubby said:
> 
> 
> [![pU1FrBr.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/pU1FrBr.jpg)](http://i.imgur.com/pU1FrBr.jpg "Enlarge image")
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I have absolutely no idea what I was doing that day. The Kerbal's posture and the messed up landing gears get me every time.
> 

It looks like he is doing a thumbs down

Oops ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

![screenshot105.png](http://users.telenet.be/vrykoulaka/screenshot105.png)

Stimpy, my class-C pet-rock earned a place in my favorite thread. I'm proud of him.

![MeDQVHX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/MeDQVHX.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-12T11:12:53Z" title="02/12/2016 11:12  AM" data-short="8 yr">February 12, 2016</time> by Evanitis**

So I decided to mess around with KAS and took my copilot out skydiving. 

![DPRvLkD.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/DPRvLkD.jpg)

He doesn't seem to be enjoying it...

> So I decided to mess around with KAS and took my copilot out skydiving.

> 
> 
> 
> 
> He doesn't seem to be enjoying it...
> 

Getting hit in the face by bugs at 60 mph is bad enough.....

Why did we bend this car in half again?

![qxwRLaW.png](http://i.imgur.com/qxwRLaW.png)

![XqA3M12.png](http://i.imgur.com/XqA3M12.png)

There might have been a staging problem.

![HrKq6pv.png](http://i.imgur.com/HrKq6pv.png)

Contract builds can get pretty funny.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-03-27T03:08:50Z" title="03/27/2016 03:08  AM" data-short="8 yr">March 27, 2016</time> by Triop**
The launch failure in [this Kottabos video](https://youtu.be/RSWzNBrd-YI?t=1160). His reaction is priceless.

I just got a couple new ones yesterday...

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/QpPfO/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>

The images in question:

Spoiler

![Wheee!](http://i.imgur.com/GJLfkIc.jpg)

![He decided instead to take a fabulous bow!](http://i.imgur.com/UaFqH9B.jpg)

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

> On 8/11/2015 at 4:38 PM, UpsilonAerospace said:
> 
> 
> *Nailed it!*
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [![Z0VAC2J.png](http://i.imgur.com/Z0VAC2J.png)](http://i.imgur.com/Z0VAC2J.png "Enlarge image")
> 
> 
> 
> 
> After landing this little plane safely, I realized that the craft's SAS torque was great enough to pull it into this position. After a couple of false starts, I got the plane to balance on the nose. The result made it seem like Jeb had just suffered a rather hard landing... making it a perfect screenshot opportunity ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> 
> 
> 
> -Upsilon
> 

As I threatened a while back, [I have now hijacked](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/92222-ksp-memes-megathread/&do=findComment&comment=2476271) your excellent screenshot.

![xxrdWCo.png](http://i.imgur.com/xxrdWCo.png)

*the moment when you realize that your carefully plotted free return trajectory makes a loop inside the Mun*

**Edited <time datetime="2016-06-08T07:15:43Z" title="06/08/2016 07:15  AM" data-short="8 yr">June 8, 2016</time> by Evanitis**

Came in like a wrecking ball...

![screenshot60.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/44754370/screenshot60.png)
That's the second biggest orange I've ever seen!

No, the ship isn't the size of the kerbal's head... Or is it? You decide!
